list.abs: Russia is inextricably linked to the Arctic and will grow by expanding into the region ., 俄罗斯和北极紧密关联 , 其领土将通过进入北极区而扩张.
难_互动百科 ... 难解【 incomprehensible】 难解难分，难分难解【 be inextricably involved】 难解之谜【 subtlety】.
inextricable mixture 不可分混合物 inflammable mixture 可燃混合气 intimate mixture 紧密混合物;【冶】均匀[单相]混合物; 均质[均一]混合物 intraclass mixture.
They were inextricably tied up with feudal forces ., 他们和封建势力有千丝万缕的联系.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin inextricabilis, from in- 'not' + extricare 'unravel' (see extricate)

entry.def: If there is an inextricable link between things, they cannot be considered separately.

example.ex: Meetings are an inextricable part of business...
example.tran: 会议是商业密不可分的一部分。

example.ex: Thoreau viewed man as an inextricable part of nature...
example.tran: 梭罗认为人是自然不可分割的一部分。

means.word_mean: 1. not permitting extrication; incapable of being disentangled or untied;

auth_sentence.content: Such is the inextricable chord of fiction and fact.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such is the inextricable chord of fiction and fact.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such is the inextricable chord of fiction and fact.

auth_sentence.content: That he should run himself into inextricable Danger by going on.
auth_sentence.res_content: That he should run himself into inextricable Danger by going on.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That he should run himself into inextricable Danger by going on.

auth_sentence.content: I'll admit there is a link, if not inextricable.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'll admit there is a link, if not inextricable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'll admit there is a link, if not inextricable.

sentences.en: Art and history fuse in inextricable magic.
sentences.cn: 艺术和历史魔术般地溶和在一起,难解难分。
